statements: SELECT * FROM refugees_health_status ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM refugees_health_status WHERE country_of_origin = 'Syria';
SELECT refugee_id, full_name, medical_treatment_history FROM refugees_health_status WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM refugees_health_status WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT refugee_id, country_of_origin FROM refugees_health_status WHERE medical_treatment_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM refugees_health_status WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT full_name, country_of_origin FROM refugees_health_status WHERE country_of_origin = 'Syria' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT refugee_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM refugees_health_status WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM refugees_health_status WHERE country_of_origin = 'Iraq' AND medical_treatment_history IS NOT NULL ORDER BY refugee_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, gender, DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%M %d, %Y') AS formatted_date FROM refugees_health_status ORDER BY formatted_date DESC, full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM refugees WHERE age > 30
SELECT refugee_id, name, country_of_origin FROM refugees ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM medical_treatments WHERE treatment_type='Surgery'
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(*) AS treatment_count FROM medical_treatments GROUP BY doctor_name HAVING treatment_count > 1
SELECT * FROM refugees WHERE country_of_origin='Syria'
SELECT * FROM refugees WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT refugee_id, name, age FROM refugees WHERE country_of_origin = 'Syria' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT r.name, m.treatment_type, m.treatment_date FROM refugees r JOIN medical_treatments m ON r.refugee_id = m.refugee_id WHERE m.treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.name, r.gender, m.doctor_name FROM refugees r JOIN medical_treatments m ON r.refugee_id = m.refugee_id WHERE m.treatment_type = 'Surgery' ORDER BY r.name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_refugees FROM refugees;
SELECT * FROM Refugees;
SELECT name, age, country_of_origin FROM Refugees WHERE age > 25;
SELECT refugee_id, name, gender FROM Refugees WHERE country_of_origin = 'Syria';
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_date FROM Medical_Treatments ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT health_id, temperature, blood_pressure FROM Health_Status WHERE refugee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Refugees ORDER BY name, age DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Refugees WHERE age > 30 AND country_of_origin='Syria';
SELECT rt.treatment_name, hs.temperature FROM Medical_Treatments rt INNER JOIN Health_Status hs ON rt.treatment_id = hs.refugee_id WHERE hs.temperature > 37.5 ORDER BY hs.temperature DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT r.name, hs.date, rt.treatment_name FROM Refugees r INNER JOIN Health_Status hs ON r.refugee_id = hs.refugee_id INNER JOIN Medical_Treatments rt ON hs.refugee_id = rt.treatment_id WHERE hs.temperature < 35 ORDER BY hs.date DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT r.name, rt.treatment_name, hs.temperature FROM Refugees r LEFT JOIN Health_Status hs ON r.refugee_id = hs.refugee_id LEFT JOIN Medical_Treatments rt ON hs.refugee_id = rt.treatment_id WHERE rt.treatment_name LIKE '%vaccination%' ORDER BY r.name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM refugee_personal_info;
SELECT first_name, last_name, nationality FROM refugee_personal_info ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever';
SELECT treatment, doctor_name FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM refugee_personal_info WHERE nationality = 'Syrian';
SELECT * FROM refugee_personal_info;
SELECT first_name, last_name, nationality FROM refugee_personal_info WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, nationality, gender FROM refugee_personal_info WHERE nationality='Syrian';
SELECT * FROM health_status WHERE temperature > 37.5;
SELECT * FROM refugees;
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM refugees WHERE age < 30;
SELECT name, treatment, doctor FROM refugees JOIN health_records ON refugees.id = health_records.refugee_id;
SELECT name, dosage, side_effects FROM medication WHERE dosage = '50mg';
SELECT name, location, contact_number FROM medical_facilities ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM refugees WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, nationality FROM refugees WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY nationality ASC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT treatment, doctor FROM health_records JOIN refugees ON health_records.refugee_id = refugees.id WHERE refugees.age < 18;
SELECT name, specialization, department FROM medical_staff WHERE department = 'Pediatrics';
